EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_DenverOfficeOpeningQ215.Cancellation
EmailTemplate.subject: Denver Office Opening - Postponement Annoucement
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
We regret to inform you that we are postponing our Pivotal Denver Office Opening scheduled for next week on Thursday, June 11.
Thank you for interest and we will inform you of the new date soon!
We appreciate your support and we look forward to joining the Denver community!
Please email us <mailto:pivotal-operations@pivotal.io> should you have any questions.
The Pivotal Team
